articles.author: Will Stone
articles.title: Antidepressant side effects differ greatly depending on the drug, study finds - NPR
articles.description: Millions of Americans take antidepressants. And like all medication they come with side effects. Researchers studied 30 different antidepressants and found side effects vary from drug to drug.
articles.content:
Doctors have long known that antidepressants come with side effects for cardiovascular and metabolic health.
But a major analysis from a team of researchers in the U.K. has, for the first time, pull… [+4092 chars]
